name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_76168695-2228-4f90-abb2-78504851e2f5
text:
rule suspicious_ssh_connection_to_sensitive_environment {
  
  meta:
    author = "IniTech Security"
    description = "Allowed low prevalence SSH connection between a sensitive and non-sensitive environment"
    confidence = "High"
    severity = "High"
    priority = "High"
    flag = "0xini1249"
    category = "Lateral Movement"
    technique = "Remote Services"
    subtechnique = "SSH"

  events:
    // We are looking for an SSH Network Connection...
    $ssh_netcon.metadata.event_type = "NETWORK_CONNECTION"
    $ssh_netcon.metadata.product_event_type = "ssh"

    // which were successful...
    $ssh_netcon.security_result.action = "ALLOW"

    // from a "non-sensitive" asset...
    $ssh_netcon.principal.hostname = $source_host
    not $ssh_netcon.principal.labels.value in %sensitive_labels
    
    // to a "sensitive" asset...
    $ssh_netcon.target.hostname = $dest_host
    $ssh_netcon.target.hostname != /test/
    $ssh_netcon.target.labels.value in %sensitive_labels
 
  match:
    // unique connection in the last day
    $source_host, $dest_host over 24h

  outcome:
    $tactic = max(10)
    $technique = max(1021)
    //$subtechnique = array("SSH")
    $principalHostname = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.principal.hostname )
    $principalIp = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.principal.ip )
    $principalMac = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.principal.mac )
    $principalProcessFileMd5 = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.principal.process.file.md5 )
    $targetHostname = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.target.hostname )
    $targetIp = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.target.ip )
    $targetMac = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.target.mac )
    $targetProcessFileMd5 = array_distinct($ssh_netcon.target.process.file.md5)

  condition:
    // Then, trigger a detection if there are one or more of these connections. 
    #ssh_netcon = 1
}
author: IniTech Security

metadata.description: Allowed low prevalence SSH connection between a sensitive and non-sensitive environment

compilationDiagnostics.message: labels field is deprecated and might not populate as expected.
labels field is deprecated and might not populate as expected.
